website_summaries.verdict: Sleek, lightweight, high-tech device offers air purification, space heater and fan.
pros: Automatically senses ‘pollution events’ and activates twin filtration (including HEPA)
It’s also a room heater with thermostatic control and cooling fan
10 speeds and 350° rotation for full room coverage up to 290 sq
cons: Filters need to be replaced every 6 months, at over £100

customer_reviews.title: Does DYSON know who their customers are?
customer_reviews.text: What do you mean I cannot set or see temperatures in fahrenheit? Does DYSON (and AMAZON) know who their customers are? For sitting awfully close to the center of the United States, being shipped a heater that reports temperature and needs its temperature set in celsius is offensive. And when that is the first issue that you face, even perfect after that is severely tainted.
customer_reviews.author: OscarPhilips

customer_reviews.title: Effectively useless
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sleek appearing and easy to set up. Would not recommend for use in nursery or room where you are not physically present as temperature cannot be changed via app or voice, but only by remote which only works with direct line of sight. Also product grossly misread the room temperate at ~ 3-4 degrees higher than other 2 temp sensors in the room and as a result keeps trying to cool an already cold room. Dyson support is very unhelpful claiming product needs 6 days to calibrate and nothing can be done until that amount of time has passed. Definitely not worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Nannaya Jampala

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this. It is very quiet. Easy to control with remote, Alexa and app. Cooling fan, heater, and air purifier

customer_reviews.text: System is quiet and very easy to use and set up. Both cooling and heating in the same unit is fantastic, Filters for allergies and everything in these trying times makes you relax.
